text: The 2025 Virginia gubernatorial election will be held on November 4, 2025. Current Republican governor Glenn Youngkin cannot run for re-election since the state's governors cannot run for two consecutive terms. ==Republican primary== ===Candidates=== ====Declared==== *Winsome Sears, Lieutenant Governor of Virginia (2022–present) ====Declined==== * Jason Miyares, Attorney General of Virginia (2022–present) (running for re-election) ==Democratic primary== ===Candidates=== ====Declared==== * Abigail Spanberger, U.S. representative from (2019–present) ====Withdrawn==== * Levar Stoney, mayor of Richmond (2017–present) and former Virginia Secretary of the Commonwealth (2014–2016) (running for lieutenant governor) ==References== Category:2025 elections in North America Category:2025 in the United States Category:2020s in Virginia
title: 2025 Virginia gubernatorial election
